overview:
Ashok sets strategy and direction and manages investor relations.

Ashok is a serial entrepreneur and investor. He founded Midcom Communications and Trex Communications (IPOâ€™ed, 1994) and was CEO of Prime Wave Communications. Ashok is on the Council of Overseers of the Jones Graduate School of Business of Rice University, and serves as the Chairman of TiE Global. Ashok earned his BS from IIT Delhi and MS from Marquette University.

In his spare time, Ashok enjoys wine, cricket, golf and has also made four critically acclaimed movies.
